trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_00<tab>Laxio of Little Solace remains unconvinced of your intentions.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_01<tab>Laxio demands that you obey his every command as proof that you are a friend to the sylphs. First, /poke his back to scratch an itch.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_02<tab>By touching Laxio, you have been afflicted with a sylphic curse that turns one's skin to moss. /examineself and ascertain its dire effect.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_03<tab>The curse was a lie; Laxio was only fooling you. Express your adulation and /congratulate him on his brilliant ruse.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_04<tab>Your sense of humor pleases Laxio, who now welcomes you to Little Solace with wings outspread.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_TODO_00<tab>/poke Laxio.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_TODO_01<tab>/examineself before Laxio.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_TODO_02<tab>/congratulate Laxio.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_000<tab>Walking one may dance many dances, but this one still doesn't like walking ones! Why? Because walking ones don't listen! That's why!

TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_001<tab>If walking one wants to be friend to this one, walking one should listen, and listen good! This one has itchy spot on back. Walking one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> it.

TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_010<tab>This one has itchy spot on back. Walking one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> it. And not too hard! This one has sensitive fibers.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_015<tab>Tee hee! Walking one fell into trap! Touching this one turns walking ones' skin into moss!

TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_016<tab>Tee hee! Mossy one's skin turns greener and greener! Mossy one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>examine self<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to see how silly mossy one has become!
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_020<tab>Do walking one's ears not hear? This one said walking one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> this one's back!
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_030<tab>Tee hee! Mossy one's skin turns greener and greener! Mossy one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>examine self<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_035<tab>Hee hee hee! Walking one is so silly! There is no curse, silly one!

TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_036<tab>This one tricked silly one good, yes? This one is smart. Silly one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>congratulate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> this one for being so very smart.

TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_040<tab>Does walking one's brain turn to moss, too? This one said mossy one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>examine self<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. What is mossy one waiting for?
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_050<tab>This one is smart. Silly one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>congratulate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> this one for being so very smart.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_055<tab>That's right, silly one! This one is very, very smart one. Silly one is smart to know this.
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_056<tab>Silly one makes this one laugh. This one likes to laugh. Maybe silly one is not so bad, after all.

TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_060<tab>Silly one is no fun! This one tricked silly one. Silly one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>congratulate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> this one for being so very smart.
